1449180.name: Traxion
1449180.description:
TRAXION is a retro-style cave flyer featuring beautiful pixel art, great music, and tons of physics-based puzzles. 

You are being sent on a dangerous mission in outer space. Fly your ship through the underground caves of four different alien planets. Find the valuable Klystron pods, and tow them back to the surface using your ships tractor beam. But beware! Alien patrol ships are out to get you, and many traps and surprises await.

The game has 4 different planets with 10 levels each. Every level introduces a new gameplay element. You can play with game controller, keyboard, mouse, or a combination thereof.
1449180.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
